name: Podcast AI Model
description: This project allows anyone to generate, process, and publish podcasts automatically with the help of AI models (speech synthesis, transcription, and enhancement).

name: AI Weather Station MVP
description: A minimal AI-enhanced weather station built with Arduino UNO that collects temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure data, and provides a basic weather forecast using rule-based logic.

name: NarratoAI (Hearify)
description: NarratoAI converts any article, blog, or webpage into natural-sounding audio instantly. Paste a URL or upload text, choose your preferred voice, and listen anywhere. Perfect for commuting, studying, or multitasking, with downloadable MP3s and optional summarization for faster listening.

name: MyAgriBot
description: Your Farming Assistant in Your Pocket. MyAgriBot provides real-time agricultural information, weather forecasts, and market prices right in your Telegram app. Get instant access to farming knowledge whenever you need it!

name: LobeHub Icon Helper
description: Search, preview, and insert LobeHub icons directly in VS Code without leaving your editor (VS Code extension).

name: Fintracker
description: Track money. Achieve goals. Live better. A free, privacy-first finance tracker designed to turn your daily actions into progress. Set goals, budget with intent, and follow simple money laws that keep life on track.

name: CareerAI Website
description: Land Your Dream Job Faster with AI. Stop guessing what recruiters want. Our platform helps you build an ATS-friendly resume, write compelling cover letters, and optimize your LinkedIn profile in minutes.

name: WA Bulk Message Sender
description: Automate sending personalized WhatsApp messages to multiple contacts using Python + Selenium.

name: Img-Remover AI
description: Img-Remover AI uses the Python rembg library to remove backgrounds from images.

name: AquaAgri Ecosystem
description: Empowering communities with smart, sustainable agricultural solutions.

name: MadeToLead Website
description: Growing a business is like raising a child â€” it needs the right care, the right environment, and the right systems. At MadeToLead, we blend strategy, AI insights, and automation to fuel unstoppable growth (digital marketing company website).

name: Self-Organizing Maps Simulation
description: Self-Organizing Maps: Learn by Seeing. An intuitive, visual guide to how machines cluster and understand data.

name: Funny Development Portfolio
description: A funny and creative development portfolio website.

name: VoxCMD: Offline AI Voice Command
description: Take control of your system with voice commands that work completely offline. Enhanced security, powerful automation, zero data sharing.
